subject: Writing
title: WikiLeaks and the Age of Leaks
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on WikiLeaks and the Age of Leaks.

hook.text: In 2010, WikiLeaks published 250,000 classified US diplomatic cables. The world's secrets spilled online.

buildup.text: Julian Assange founded WikiLeaks in 2006 as a platform for anonymous whistleblower submissions.

discovery.text: The leaked cables revealed secret wars, diplomatic deception, and surveillance â€” embarrassing governments worldwide.

twist.text: Assange became a fugitive. Chelsea Manning, the source, was sentenced to 35 years (later commuted).

climax.text: WikiLeaks forced a debate: is radical transparency journalism, activism, or something else entirely?

punchline.text: The internet made leaking easy. The consequences stayed hard.
